item.title: Load XmlSchema's from BizTalk assembly
item.description: That BizTalk compiles your XmlSchema’s into an assembly is great, but wouldn’t it be greater if you could reuse those schema’s in your code? No more hassle of different versions of your schema and your schema’s always at your fingertips because they are in the GAC. Well…it took me a while to figure that it’s actually really simple to do. To load a schema from an external assembly just instantiate the class which describes your schema.
